channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. Supreme Court temporarily halts deportations of Venezuelan migrants under wartime law
item.description: The U.S. Supreme Court early on Saturday paused President Donald Trump's administration from deporting Venezuelan men in immigration custody.

item.title: Iran, U.S. to hold talks in Rome in bid to reach nuclear deal
item.description: Iran and the United States will hold a new round of nuclear talks in Rome on Saturday to resolve their decades-long standoff over Tehran's atomic aims...

item.title: Trump won’t fire Powell — but he could still pressure the Fed. Here's how.
Why Trump Media once again called out ‘naked short selling’ as its stock dropped
Where Trump’s trade deals with China, Europe, Japan and other countries stand
Trump to reclassify many federal workers, making them easier to fire
item.description: Trump to reclassify many federal workers, making them easier to fire.

item.title: Why silver could finally be a better investment opportunity than gold
U.S. judge temporarily blocks mass firings at consumer bureau
item.description: A federal judge on Friday halted the mass firings carried out Thursday afternoon at the U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau.

item.title: Trump will study whether to fire Fed Chair Powell, adviser says
item.description: "The president and his team will continue to study that matter," the White House economic adviser said.

item.title: The ‘smart money’ index is acting unusual. It could be a buying opportunity.
